level.title: Level 1
level.description:
Welcome to The Maze Caves!
 
 Since this is likely your first time playing, let me explain the object of the game;
 your goal is to maneuver the multi-floored level to get to an ending. Along the way,
 you will encounter various objects that can do different things when you move over
 them and press your 'Action' key. They are listed in the 'Key' below. There are a
 total of three floors in this level; good luck!
 
 PS: If you don't have enough time to finish the level, hold 'Control + S' to save your game.
 You can load it again at any time from the launcher.
 
 Key:
 Signs - Signs display text and sometimes hints in the level. Usually these are 'T's.
 Ladder - Ladders move you to other floors in the level. Usually these are 'V's or 'A's.
 Endings - Endings finish the level; your goal is to get to these. Usually these are 'Y's.
 
 (You can view this message anytime by pressing 'F1' in game)

Map:
AAC
! B !
BD !

PS: The X to the right isn't collidable.

Looks like the bottom is blocked.
Unfortunately, there's no secret blocks on this floor.

PS: Don't waste time, there really are no secret blocks on this floor.
